title: What??? Is it possible?
body:
I cant buy all runes? Is lt possible?

It comes with error says: you have reached the maximum amount of this item. please reach out to support...blah blah blah...

replies.body: Hum, you really sure you want to spend IP on Runes who will be removed in two months?

There is a cap to many runes you can have, so we may need to remove some of the super older ones.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work with you directly to find some options.
